reviewText: This video is a must for any political enthusiast!  I, personally reccomend it!  This video not only offer us an in-depth look into Colin Powell's astonishing military career, but offers us a glimpse into his private life as well!  I was deeply moved by his confidence, to overcome racial barriers, to become one of the most prominent figures in politics today!  He is definitely, without a doubt, an example of the "American Dream"!
